__e: - Now it's too late, it had to be done earlier, I'm sorry...
You needed to do this because your husband bedded every woman he liked throughout your marriage, and you came out of it believing that you were unlovable, so you used power to make me true.
The minute he killed one of our own... you should have torn him to pieces.
You didn't even have to go after the moonstone in the first place.
It's bad enough what the two of you did, but did you have to leave that note?
(RIPLEY) I had all this lined up for tomorrow but you lot, you have to open your presents early, don't you?
That doesn't mean you should have gone and done what you did.
Now it's down to the General Council to decide now, all right?
He said all you had to do was ask me if I wanted to come home.
You don't have the decency to do this at my husband's office. You have to come here and embarrass us in front of all of our friends, you piece of shit!
This cottage was going to be yours and your husband's, wasn't it?
I told you that you had to go away with me.
You and Yoli must have been very close to help out with the family like this.
You and Max must have been really close.
You must have been if he wouldn't mind you pawing through his gear.
Excuse me, lieutenant... but the chief said you and your men would be available to us.
Okay, that does sound bad. But, look, you just had to be there, okay? He's very articulate.
You must've been a wonderful father, but she's not your... hmm.
I thought you should see for yourself, my lord, as soon as possible.
His face when he saw the pistol! He bought it.
Now, last night, the crazy man said he needed to meet you near his house.
